text: 8:5 Khong 25:40Purohit oina makhoina touriba thabak adu swargada leiriba adugi mawong amadi mami khaktani. Asiga mannana Moses-tasu toukhi. Mahakna Asengba Phisang adu saramdaida Tengban Mapuna mangonda haikhi, “Chingthakta eina nangonda utkhiba mawong adugi matung inna pumnamak nahakna soidana sagadabani.”
